improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error in line 12. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before performing the division.
Unreachable code paths. The loop iterates 10 times reducing x from 10 to 0. After the loop, line 12 tries to divide by x resulting in a division by zero exception.
Potential performance improvement in line 12. The division operation is computationally expensive, especially for integer division. If possible, re-write the algorithm to avoid this operation.
